pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains material for Lewis's television and radio programs, including complete scripts as well as jokes and monologues written for use on these programs, correspondence, news clippings, music scores and photographs that document his entertainment career between the mid-1940s and 1960. Radio programs that are represented in this collection include Arthur Godfrey Time and both the radio and television versions of the Robert Q. Lewis Show.
